thoughts.text: I think I will use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a summary of the text on the Atlas Obscura website.
thoughts.reasoning: The previous 'browse_website' command returned a list of links to explore on the Atlas Obscura website. I want to learn more about the website and the unique destinations it offers, and the 'get_hyperlinks' command will allow me to get a summary of the text on the website.
thoughts.plan: - Use 'get_hyperlinks' to get a summary of the text on the Atlas Obscura website
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time exploring the website and ensure that I am still making progress towards my other goals.
